name: factory-knows
description: An instanceof alternative for non class based, factory oriented, programming.

scripts.build: npm run esm && npm run cjs
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = factoryKnows;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default factoryKnows;' >> esm/index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
